name: FigMeme
description:
Looking for a fun way to share customised memes with your team mates? We, the folks at Zeta, built the FigMeme plugin to satisfy our need to always be meme-ready. We pride ourselves on our culture of conversing extensively using funny GIFs and sarcastic memes.


Here’s why FigMeme is awesome:

  • Search using a keyword: Can’t find the perfect meme yet? Explore the meme-verse using a keyword.
  • Get customised memes in seconds: Edit your meme with captions and customise them with different typefaces, colours and strokes.
  • Save your favourites: Easily access your go-to memes by ‘adding to favourite’.
  • Keep up with trends: Be up to date with your meme-game by seeing what’s trending.
  • ‘I’m feeling unlucky’: Not sure what you’re looking for ? Don’t sweat it, we’ll pick one for you.


Show FigMeme some love by tagging @zetaux1 on Twitter! Happy meme-ing folks!
